author: bmwlego
title: Boxy Looking Racer
review:
I am lucky that this set survived my Dark Age and that my mother didn't give it away to my cousin. This is a boxy little racer built in perfect minifig scale. The #2 bricks and tile are great details. The minifig included is awesome and the directions call for pieces that are very easy to find in many colors. I used the directions from this set to create a rival "Number 3" racer. Check it out at my brickshelf gallery:
http://www.brickshelf.com/cgi-bin/gallery.cgi?m=notenoughbricks

author: hustla187
title: Rally Cars are Cool
review: This is a pretty cool rally car in minifig scale. I like the number 2 tiles and pieces on the side of the car. The headlights are an awesome part of this set because it makes it a real rally car. The spoiler is pretty sick too. 5 out of 5 for an outstanding set.
